p: In the D group, the antioxidant potential has increased because of the deficiency of the antioxidant defense system as well as the increase in the blood glucose and lipid levels. In fact, free radicals may produce damaging effects on the cells, causing lipid peroxidation in the cell membranes such as MDA, which is the last product of lipid peroxidation and one of the oxidative stress biomarkers [ 28].
